chara.textHome:
Yo! There ya are!
I just got back from a swim.
Though I'd like to swim some more...
Wanna race?

The sun rises so early in the summer
I ended up waking up now...

Guess I could sleep a bit more,
but seein' how we're both up,
wanna go swim?

When ya think of a beach house,
ya think of yakisoba, ramen, curry,
takoyaki...

The list goes on, but there's no point in
worryin' about what to pick, so I'mma
just go ahead and eat 'em all.

What's for dinner at the inn?
I ate lots at the beach house,
but I could make room for fresh seafood.
...Dinner's seafood, right?

We're gonna be settin' off fireworks, so
I went ahead and brought some grilled corn.

I haven't eaten any yet,
but it adds to the atmosphere, ya know?

I'm eatin' well and drinkin' well,
as you can see.
And I'm restin' lots, too.

I TOLD everyone I'm fine.
Why do they keep botherin' me?!
Ugh, it sucks doin' hard work in this heat.

Guess Witches don't really care about
the heat though, huh?

Oh well, so long as I get a Grief Seed
I don't care.
I come in a swimsuit, so my copy does too?

She doesn't have to copy me THAT faithfully.
It's kinda weird, isn'it it?

All I did was try a taste of her shaved ice,
but Sayaka went nuts on me, so I gave her
a bite of mine. That makes us even.
You want some? It's apple.

If we're gonna eat those noodles
you send down pipes, I'm only eatin'.

I mean, Mami or someone who likes
helpin' out'll probably do the work and
send 'em down to me.

I guess it's not really the season
for diggin' up clams.
I did wanna try pickin' and eatin' my own...
Welp, can't do it now...

A swimmin' contest?!
Nice idea!

Though I gotta say, it's no contest
with me around. I ain't losin'!

I'm gonna reach the goal and
leave you at the shore!

I don't really care what swimsuit I wear,
but Mami wouldn't stop askin' me to
go look at new ones with her...
Ah well, I kinda like it.

A swimsuit like Homura's wouldn't suit me,
so I have no reason to wanna wear it...
but I can't stop lookin' at it.
Maybe 'cause it's so fluttery?
Hmm...
Oh! Got it!

I was tryin' to think what sport
Sayaka's swimsuit fit, and it's surfing!
Don't ya think it looks perfect for surfing?!

Swimmin' in the summer sea in our
swimsuits, eatin' all kindsa food,
lightin' fireworks...

Pretty carefree, even for me.
It was fun, though.
Eeeeeeugh! C-c-cold!!!

Who did it?!
Who splashed me from behind?!

I hope you're prepared for payback,
whoever ya are!
